title: :ambulance: zb: Handle 0 bytes received from socket + 2 other small changes
body:
Zeeshan Ali Khan on behalf of MBition GmbH.

[Provider Information](https://github.com/mercedes-benz/foss/blob/master/PROVIDER_INFORMATION.md#mbition-gmbh).

title: zn: implement Str <-> names conversinos
body: Plus deduplicate some code with macros.

title: zb: add arg0ns to match rule, deprecate arg0namespace
body:
arg0namespace has an overly restrictive type (InterfaceName), which disallows valid values (e.g. those containing '-' or single-element names such as 'org').

Further more, a MatchRule with arg0namespace previously would not match a message whose arg0 is not a valid InterfaceName (even if it is a valid BusName).

fixes #382

title: 🐛 zb: Don't choke on empty match rule arg values
body: Also add a testcase for it.

title: ⬆️ zb: Update enumflags2
body:
Updates dependency to the patch version of 0.7.7

[Advisory](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2023-0035.html)
[fix](https://github.com/meithecatte/enumflags2/releases/tag/v0.7.7)

title: Adding disable property caching FAQ
body: The property caching feature wasn't well documented. This commit adds it to the FAQ section of the book.

body: This is old (1.0) API.

title: Some size related fixes
body: Fixes #330.

title: ✨ (zb): Add `MessageStream::{max_queued,set_max_queued}`
body:
Add getter and setter for message queue capacity.

Related: #350.

title: Simplify futures at connection init + drop run_in_thread internal utility + MSRV bump
body:
MSRV bump was not planned for this PR but yet another [dep bumped their MSRV](https://github.com/dbus2/zbus/actions/runs/5027953247/jobs/9018085702) so after consulting with Tauri devs, I decided to bump the MSRV already (we were supposed to do that soon anyway).

---

Zeeshan Ali Khan on behalf of MBition GmbH.

[Provider Information](https://github.com/mercedes-benz/foss/blob/master/PROVIDER_INFORMATION.md#mbition-gmbh).

title: zv: Impl Type for std Duration and NonZero*
body: Closes #334

title: zv: Optional::default shouldn't call NoneValue::null_value
body:
Otherwise we end up with a infinite mutual recursion between these calls and hence a stack overflow.

Fixes #343.

title: zv,zb: Add missing container depth checks + Reject empty structs in signatures
body:
This is to address some issues spotted during recent fuzzing runs in the CI:

https://github.com/dbus2/zbus-old/actions/runs/4915689965/jobs/8778478660
https://github.com/dbus2/zbus-old/actions/runs/4927346573/jobs/8804199850

Zeeshan Ali Khan on behalf of MBition GmbH.

title: zb: Connection::peer_credentials now async
body:
Most likely, querying the group IDs will involve potentially blocking calls (e.g `getgrouplist` is blocking on Linux) so best be safe and keep it async from the get go so we don't have to break API.

---

Zeeshan Ali Khan on behalf of MBition GmbH.

[Provider Information](https://github.com/mercedes-benz/foss/blob/master/PROVIDER_INFORMATION.md#mbition-gmbh).
